message.body: Yeah my dads good... Whats going on?
Uh i heard there was a shooting at the empire state building...?
Holy shit yeah he's fine lmao. It was in the sidewalk he was upstairs, he says thank you very much for inquiring. And thank you very much for informing me!
Ok phew thank god, no problem! If you find out what the incident was about let me know?
According to reuters, a disgruntled fashion designer killed his ex coworkers and some other bystanders. He was shot down
Damn that's actually a little ridiculous
Yeah violent ass niggas coulda hurt my dad!
